asset_classes_subtitle: Manage the different classes of assets in your inventory

name: Name
provider_manual_description: The manual provider allows you to manage assets without a specific API integration. This is useful for custom or legacy systems.
provider_cloudflare_description: The Cloudflare provider allows you to manage assets using the Cloudflare API. This is useful for integrating with Cloudflare services.
provider_namecheap_description: The Namecheap provider allows you to manage assets using the Namecheap API. This is useful for integrating with Namecheap services.
provider_hetzner_description: The Hetzner provider allows you to manage assets using the Hetzner API. This is useful for integrating with Hetzner services.
